project.name: High-build machinery primer optimisation

text_blocks:

input.message: Access denied. You cannot pause this project because you are not the project Lead and do not have Corporate Leadership permissions. Only the project Lead (employee Bhwa_041) or Corporate Leadership can change the project status.
